resources.string: Test your knowledge in geography! How many questions can you answer?
Type in your first name please
Thank you for taking the Geography Test!\nHit the submit button to get your results!
What is Earth\'s third largest continent by land surface size?
On which continent is Bhutan located?
Select the islands of the Mediterranean sea
Which is the largest landlocked country (has no borders on sea)?
Which is the longest river in Europe?
How many states are in the U.S.A.?
Which colors make up the flag of Russia?
Which country has the largest population in Africa?
Type the name of one Scandinavian country below
Which countries are not on the equator?
\n\nIf you liked this quiz, check out Triviaplaza.com for more quizzes in more topics!
\n(tap on this message to open their site in your browser)
/10, try again or take look at the answers

Earth's third largest continent is North America, first being Asia and Africa second 

Bhutan is in South Asia 

Borneo is located Southeast Asia. Cyprus, Corsica and Sicily are on the Mediterranean sea 

The largest country without a sea border is Khazakhstan 

Europe's longest river is Volga (3,692km long), which is located entirely in Russia 

There are 50 states in the United States of America 

White, blue and red are the colors of the Russian flag 

Nigeria is the most populated country in Africa 

The Scandinavian countries are Sweden, Denmark and Norway 

Malaysia and Venezuela are close to the equator, but it's not passing through them
